captions.text: Balls. *laughter* It's called balls, folks.
It's classy looking, it has grip. It's also ribbed for your pleasure.
It smells like it would be very effective at getting paint off of furniture.
Oh I like that!
Creamy, subtle, red bull.
This is like the champagne of energy drinks.  Definitely.
Grab yourself some balls. Grab yourself some balls.  *laughter*  Victorian lemonade. Fermented, botanical lemon drink with ginger and herbal extracts.
It looks like it's from Trader Joes.
*squealing sounds* *laughter* Oh my god.
It's closer to eating a lemon than it is to drinking a soda.
I like it. I don't.
It's like big boy lemonade.
Ramune'... Carbonated soft drink.
It's a clever beverage... What do we do? Oh god.
It also looks incredibly phallic.
Oh shit.
*smack* Yeah!
This smells like gum.
Do not place any body parts into the bottle.  *laughter* Whoa.
And I hate this.
It's just kind of vaguely generic candy.  But I like that.
Almdudler.  50 Jahre.  50 Jahre of Almdudler.
It sounds like that hum diddle diddle, hum diddle I.
*smacking*
It's a little sour, it's also not incredibly overwhelming with any type of taste.
I wonder if everyone in Austria just walks around like... *smacks*
Yeah, that's where it's at.  This is so good.  Mhmm.
It's kind of like awful ginger ale.
Malta Hatuey, non-alcoholic cereal beverage.  Cereal beverage?
Looks like a meal.
*slight laughter* A sour earth?
Whoa.  *cackle*
Yeah it's like a watered-down vegemite.  Really? Yeah.
Now it tastes like a cereal.   Yeah.
It tastes like a 14 year old was like, I'm gonna invent a new soda.
Like what would you mix this with? Water, until there's none of the original left.  *laughter*
Or you can drink it this way... Hey girl what's up? *rattles bottle* *laughter*

What idiots! Malta (Malt) is extremely refreshing and delicious when very 
cold.  They also make it in Puerto Rico, which tastes even better. If you 
want a real boost, make a mix of a Malta, a raw egg and a spoon full of 
sugar. Shake and drink. Woo Hoo! These people have compromised taste buds.﻿

comments.text:
+BuzzFeedYellow  
Next time if you do drinks can you do one just on Australian & New Zealand 
Soft Drinks?

Try Bundaberg Ginger Beer, Kirks Sno Drop, Kirks Kole Beer, Kirks 
Watermelonade, Pineapple soft drinks (Kirks has one as does Coles & 
Woolworths Supermarkets!) all from Australia as well as Lemon & Paeroa also 
called L&P from New Zealand! (BTW Sno is not meant to have a W at the end 
thats how it's spelt for some odd reason!)

Hell I might even be even willing to send you some of them outta my own 
pocket! Thank you +BuzzFeedYellow =)﻿
